sentences.en: A three - dimensional model of the pulsar magnetosphere by Prof K . S . Cheng of HKU.
sentences.cn: 脉冲星磁层的三维模型﹝照片提供:香港大学郑广生教授﹞.

sentences.en: The earth's magnetosphere is at once protective and dangerous.
sentences.cn: 地球的磁层既具有保护的功能，却又极其危险。

sentences.en: The energy of the particles and the fields in the magnetosphere can vary by large amounts.
sentences.cn: 带电粒子的能量大小与磁气圈中的磁场的大小变化极大。

sentences.en: The movie almost gets this one right—Earth’s magnetosphere does protect us from blasts of subatomic particles from the sun.
sentences.cn: 影片在这点上倒是说对了，地球的磁气圈确实保护我们免受太阳风中亚原子颗粒的直击。

sentences.en: The rate at which the solar wind transfers energy to the magnetosphere can vary widely, but what determines the rate of energy transfer is unclear.
sentences.cn: 太阳风将能量转化至磁气圈的速率变化很大。 但是目前为止，我们仍不清楚到底是什么在决定着这种传送速率。

sentences.en: This animation shows a conceptual sketch of Mercury's magnetosphere at the time of the MESSENGER flyby.
sentences.cn: 这个动画是信使号探测船探测水星磁层时的模拟图.

sentences.en: We use a three dimensional pulsar magnetosphere model to study the geometry of outer magnetospheric gaps.
sentences.cn: 利用三维脉冲星磁层模型研究了磁层外隙的几何结构.

trans.tran_en: the region surrounding a planet, such as the earth, in which the behaviour of charged particles is controlled by the planet's magnetic field
